01.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt supported and and encouraged by others.

02.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have often been hard on myself.

03.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have often felt proud of my creative achievements.

04.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt like I belong and have friends.

05.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt sad.

06.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally helped create places where people feel welcome.

07.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt lonely.

08.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have often expressed myself creatively.

09.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt unispired and not motivated.

10.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt unfairly judged by others.

11.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally had a shared sense of joy with people around me.

12.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt that people appreciated my culture.

13.text: In the past 2 weeks, I have generally felt confident around others.

14.text: How do you feel about taking part in this programme?

15.text: Is there anything else that we should know?
